posts.body: Well, they did say I would be here forever.
posts.files: [{"name":"I WANT TO D R E A M.jpg","thumb":"588425ad3ecb7c93c9d55ec70db833030b7052c4-thumb.jpg","size":34382,"type":"image/jpeg","original":"380b1bf80f9aa5d41400b14579afd0a7aeef4ce1.jpg","directory":"1Br16cbx4FN8JysMk5suq64ym3ZMqtqcqc"}]

posts.body:
>>b4c932ac-9125-4103-9b6b-e12378580b43
It's beautiful! I especially love how Mark's signature is a kikel.

Anyone got the Dragon Quest symphonic suites and/or SMT4 OST in .flac? Also, does anyone know how to quickly convert .flac files into .opus en masse while retaining the metadata? I have the VA-11 HALL-A OST and the Ace Attorney jazz & orchestra album and would like to share them with anons who don't have much space.

>>4d319847-ee16-499a-aca6-fca8c8e7af96
If anons want smaller sizes, we should stick with opus instead of mp3. The sound quality is better while getting smaller filesizes.

>>e44f99e4-000e-4b99-a5de-638296cf76b4
>implying nu-/pol/ = /pol/

At the time of the shooting /pol/ was filled to the brim with nothing but feds, shills, redditors and Q-boomers. The number of actual /pol/lacks on the board was nonexistent thanks to this new userbase rendering discussion near impossible.

May imkamphy rot in hell for the nigh-irreversible damage he did to /pol/, I can only hope that 8ch being down temporarily will purge some of the cancer.

>>4b1e1e0a-a9f7-48b2-bbf3-90baf1e0eae4
I see you've made it here, niggerpill.

>>678011a9-6325-443a-81e1-f1bcf7c22729
Tarrant might have been lulzy as hell, but he accomplished jack shit in the end. Accelerationism is a shit-tier meme.
Is it possible for the game to be made open source, or is it made on someone else's proprietary engine?

Last SMT I played was Strange Journey, which ended up being one of my favourite games of all time. It's easily in the top 5!

**I still haven't played Nocturne, HD PC port when?**

>>ec7191a4-ea26-4033-a0ad-34862565533b
I'm seeing this shite all over /v/ now, is there a way to mass mute from the catalog?

posts.body:
>>1e6872c8-9ba4-49bb-a24f-c85a8e337cb3
All you need for magnets is a torrent client, I recommend Transmission, rTorrent, QBittorrent and Deluge in particular. You just need to open the URL using the client and you're good to go! Also, don't use Malwarebytes. It seems counterproductive to use a proprietary program to handle malware, given that you can't see the source code and therefore cannot be 100% sure of what it does. 

In any case, I hope you enjoy sailing the seven seas.

>>a1393d19-5ba4-4149-bab2-867ff7b1ce33
I've tried to, but my computer is ass (FX-8350 w/ R9-270X running GNU/Linux) so I get constant awful framedrops, even in software mode. I hope that Play! makes quick progress because I fucking hate PCSX2.

>>3da94ff4-91c4-4918-820c-df30e7b9f9ca
>playing SJR over the original
Why would you do that to yourself? Furthermore, why are you playing the dumpster fire known as 4A? **I liked 4 at least**

If it's because you have a 3DS w/ no flashcart, play the Devil Survivor and Soul Hackers remake. They're both absolutely fantastic.
